resources.string: Please grant the WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission to this app via ADB.
When enabling/disabling USB debugging via a quick settings tile fails, notification permission is required to display an error.
ADB requires permission to be granted
To toggle USB debugging from the Quick Settings tile, you need the WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission.\n\nPlease run the following command from your PC:
adb shell pm grant net.ogatomo.developerOptions android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
